name: Fantasy Grounds - Dreams of Steam 2: The Foul Strumpet (Map Pack)
detailed_description:
Dreams of Steam 2: The Foul Strumpet


Dreams of Steam 2: The Foul Strumpet brings a steam-powered flyer to your game table. Perfect for both fantasy and steampunk, the 3 maps give you three levels for the gas bag, top deck and lower deck for a small but formidable ship of the skies.

Includes 3 hi-resolution maps: Deck, Below, and Top.

Requires: A Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license or subscription and any of the included rulesets.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
